Judul: SIPHON STRING INSTALLATION TO OPTIMIZE WELL PRODUCTION AND REDUCE THE SLUG FLOW
Abstrak:
Well A is an oil production well that has been drilled using the horizontal well method from zone X. Zone X
has a temperature of 2050 F, a pressure of 600 psi, and water cut by 25%. Tubing in well A has an inside
diameter of 2.75", and the casing installed has an inside diameter of 5.5". Well A cannot produce with the
natural flow, so the gas lift is injected into the tubing at a depth of 5046 ft-MD and a rate of 0.6 MMSCFD as an
artificial lift method.
To optimize the production rate and reduce the slug flow on tubing, the siphon string will be installed inside
the tubing to give a deeper injection point without recompletion. This thesis is conducted to analyze the siphon
string installation in some cases, such as extending the length of the siphon string, deepening the depth of the
siphon string and gas lift point of injection, sensitivity to gas lift injection rate, sensitivity with tubing diameter,
and sensitivity with GOR of reservoir.
From several cases carried out by well modeling, deepening the point of gas lift injection by installing the
siphon string increases the production rate of well A and reduces the slug flow in the tubing. If the siphon string
is extended to a depth below SSSV (577 ft-MD), it will increase the production rate. However, economic
calculations must be carried out to determine whether it is profitable. The production of well A increases along
with the gas lift rate, and the maximum gas lift rate injection can reduce the slug flow on the tubing. Siphon
string installation also can optimize the well production and reduce slug flow with a bigger tubing diameter.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Silvya Dewi Rahmawati, S.Si., M.Si., Ph.D.
Kata Kunci: Siphon String, Production Rate, Slug, Optimize, Gas Lift Injection
